# Method ip_pool_delete

## Description
	Delete an IPv4 pool

## Mandatory Input Parameters

## Input Parameters
	* site_id: type: >0
	* site_name: type: string, max length: 128
	* subnet_id: type: >0
	* pool_id: type: >0
	* start_addr: type: ipv4_addr
	* end_addr: type: ipv4_addr
	* pool_size: type: >0
	* validate_warnings: type: enum, values: accept

## Returned Values
	* ret_oid
	* errno
	* errmsg
	* msg
	* severity
	* parameters
	* param_format
	* param_value
	* ret_code
